00250   void updateSetPoint();

00252   void setDesiredVelocity(double v) {desiredVelocity = v;}

00261 class RigidDOF : public DOF 
00262 {
00263 private:
00265         double getClosestJointLimit(int *direction);
00266 public:
00267         RigidDOF() : DOF() {}
00268         RigidDOF(RigidDOF *original) : DOF(original) {}
00269         Type getType() const {return RIGID;}
00270 
00271     //------------------- STATICS ---------------------
00273         virtual bool accumulateMove(double q1, double *jointVals, int *stoppedJoints);
00275         virtual void updateFromJointValues(const double *jointVals = NULL);
00277         virtual void updateVal(double q1){q = q1;}
00279         virtual void reset(){}
00281         virtual double getStaticRatio(Joint *j) const;
00283         virtual void getJointValues(double *jointVals) const;
00285 
00288         virtual bool computeStaticJointTorques(double*,double){return true;}
00289 
00290     //------------------- DYNAMICS ---------------------
00292         virtual int getNumLimitConstraints();
00294         virtual void buildDynamicLimitConstraints(std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices, int numBodies, 
00295                                                                                           double* H, double *g, int &hcn);
00297         virtual int getNumCouplingConstraints(){return jointList.size() - 1;}
00299         virtual void buildDynamicCouplingConstraints(std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices, int numBodies, 
00300                                                                                              double* Nu, double *eps, int &ncn);
00302         virtual void setForce(double f);
00303 };

00331 
00332 public:

00336                                                                                    mBreakAwayValues(NULL), 
00337                                                                                    mBreakAwayTorque(original->mBreakAwayTorque) {}
00338         ~BreakAwayDOF();
00339 
00341         void initDOF(Robot *myRobot,const std::list<Joint *>& jList);
00343         virtual bool accumulateMove(double q1, double *jointVals, int *stoppedJoints);

00347         virtual void updateVal(double q1);

00396
